content.detailedDescription:
Ok first off i am not a ufo nut. i have never filed a ufo report before.
i am a gold miner. we stay at the lost dutchman mining camp stanton a.Z. for 6 months out of the year. sense 2005. the camp has a nightly poker game for members. during a break in the game. the smokers go out on the porch and around to the front porch looking south to south east. toward wickenburg and phoenix. where we have observed strange light's on many occasions in the past.
this time one of the group {[name removed/dr/cms]} say's there is a fire on the mountain. 
we all see the same thing. 5 lights on top of the mountain that look like fire. we start to call the fire department. but my friend [name removed\dr\cms] say's let me get my binocular's to make sure. we all took turn's looking at this with his binoculars'. what we see is 5 orange lights spread out across the top of the hill with a black mass on top. but no one could make out the shape . but the lights were clear and very bright like flood lights. after thinking about them. i am guessing they were exhaust ports. what ever it was it was huge. i am guessing between the size of a 18 wheeler or larger.
  there were 3 lights together in the middle and one on each end all in a strait line. these lights or flames were 3 to 6 ft. across each. all the same size. 
 over the years i have known people who have gone out toward vulture mine trying to get a better look at some lights in the sky we have all seen.
and i have always said i would like to see them up close. 

ok here come's the strange part. i had a 4 wheeler setting 20 feet away. i could have jumped on it and been to the base of the hill in 3 min. 
but to this day i can not explain why i did not. instead we were all lined up on the porch looking at this thing and all of us turned to the right at the same time and walked back around and went back to playing cards. without another word or thought of the thing. till 3 days later when i realized what i had done or rather not done. i can not to this day explain why i did not run out there for a better look.
content.summary: Object was setting on top of small mountain had 5 orange lights or exaust flames

content.detailedDescription: I have seen this strange object now twice in 10 days.  it was in same location and around the same time of may 17 sighting.  this time a red light followed; and another object was blinking above for a few seconds.  lots of movement, and was hard to follow. once again an unreal experience.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Red light mimicking star like object

content.detailedDescription: Since this sighting is over 30 years old - i'm wondering if you folks are even interested in the full details of the sighting.  not wanting to waste your time, perhaps you can email me if you would like a full detailed report.  thanks.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Myself and a friend witnessed what we first thought was an airplane in the distance.  it then stopped in midair, changed direction towards us & descended. it came approximately 30 - 40' from us & hovered.

content.detailedDescription: Bright event,  looked like meteor, or something on fire,  with a trail of "sparks",  changed direcction and looks like it climbed in altitude,  lost sighting in clouds
content.summary: Thought it was very bright meteor with trailing

content.detailedDescription:
Saw bright light in sky, took a picture, zoomed in and saw what i knew was nothing like what flys in the sky, it looked like a kind of shuttle, that would be only way to describe it, i had my phone out ready as had feeling before i caught sight of it , as seems over last 2 years there seems be alot more things in the sky that aren't planes or the normal flying things
but hope to hear back at what this could be as really intrested to know what this could be
content.summary: Saw bright light way more than a star, took the picture

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my porch swing and decided to lay down on it.I looked up and noticed something just below and to the left of a cloud that looked like a large perfect round bubble i stood up looking at it wondering what it was, to big and high to be a bubble. my hair stood on end as i realized it was reflecting the sky and i saw something in the middle small rectangular could have been a reflection of my house. then it flew straight into the cloud and it seamed to disappear.I looked all around couldn't see it anymore. it very well could have blended with the clear blue sky. after telling my husband about it when he got home he suggested i report it.I wish i knew what it was.
content.summary: Round looked clear outside reflected like mirror yet could see something in middle hovered then flew into cloud disapeared

content.detailedDescription: I have trail cam set up about 55 feet from my home this morning when i looked at my pictures i saw this sphere figure above my oil tank we have almost 10 pictures all within one minute then the object went. all on a trail cam. i will send some of the pictures. please let me know what it is. i had the trail cam in the same place for the past month this is the first time seeing this. and it can not be a reflection from any thing due to there is nothing around but trees.
content.summary: Pictures on my trail cam this morning.

content.detailedDescription: Myself along with three other witnesses observed 10 red lights hovering across the bay. these lights were in the shape of a triangle just like the red dots on a bowling alley. they were also directly across from the farm were i had observed a different kind of ufo in my youth(case#65887). these lights hovered for quite awhile. we observed them for 45 minutes to an hour and left. they were still their when we left the parking lot. their was no sound to be heard from the lights. when a light would fly away it didn't fly at warp speed it just flew away then another red light would come and take the place of the one that had just left. about a month or two latter somebody in arizona filmed what appeared to be the same lights. we were trying to figure out if they were flares over the water but the formation was just to perfect.  this area at times seems to have activity. a friend of mine told me of a sighting he and a group of about40 or50 people witnessed a craft come out of the sky, suck up a bunch of seawater and then take off. he viewed this from the same spot my friends and i viewed the lights.
content.summary: 10 red lights hovering in same triangular shape as the 10 red dots on a bowling alley . after some time one red light would fly off  to the east/ southeast and another one would come and take its place. we watched this for 45 minutes to an hour then

content.detailedDescription: my dogs had to go out and i happened to look up at the sky from my doorway and spotted a light that made quick erratic movements that no aircraft i know of could make. it was a bright whitish blue light. after its zig zag motions, it quickly shot out of sight in an easterly direction and within seconds it reappeared to the original spot in which i noticed it when letting my dogs out. again moving in the same manner as prior but much faster when it returned. that is when i decided it was time to head back inside. fear got the best of me at almost 3am in the morning.
content.summary: Light made quick movements zig zaging, stopping and quickly disappeared the east and whithin seconds, it reappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was riding her horse at the barn in our neighborhood.  the ufo was spotted in the background of the video that was taken.  it moved extremely fast. it moved so fast in the background that you can barely notice it.  once we put the video in slow motion it is definitely much easier to see it flying across the sky.  the object was black in color.  the shape was disc like.  once we blew the picture up it appeared to have a dome shape.  there was no resemblance to an airplane or helicopter.   in the video you will see in the right corner a black object moving extremely fast.
content.summary: My daughter was riding. we were taking a video and later noticed the very small black object moving in a blink of an eye.   it's barely noticeable in the video. we slowed it down and its much easier to see.

content.detailedDescription: On january 6th, 2013, i was taking out the trash at 6:30 am before work when i saw what i thought was a meteor shooting down from the sky. it was red and turned orange with a trail behind it. it couldn't have been a meteor, because it changed direction, it also had a kind of roaring sound. then it changed shape and became a silver saucer and went very fast into the clouds. i took some pictures of it with my phone and as i was going back into my house a very bright light appeared over me, i heard no sound, it was like a very bright, round ball of light. i seemed in a trance and when it was gone i went to work. i might have suffered missing time, i'm not sure. because of my job with the government i couldn't say anything before now.
content.summary: I was taking out the trash at 6:30 am before work when i saw what i thought was a meteor

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at 12pm to see a comet,standing on my fathers drive way,looking at the stars,i was standing there looking up for about a half hour never saw comet. then when i looked across the street i saw this big bright light. in my mind i said to myself i never saw a light on my neighbors shrub.  i walked across the street to see the very bright light .As i got closer the light lifted up very slowly. i was shocked .It just lifted up and disappears. it was lifting very slow the closer i got to it, then in a blink of an eye it was gone.Why i didn't  report it to anyone was no one would believe me. the government would have denied me, because i just got out of federal prison in washington state at gieger fed pen.It has haunted me ever sense. you have to understand why i went outside to see the comet in the first place. when i was incarcerated there was the chief of the fire dept there to speak about fire safety. when he was introduced to us he started ranting with very high emotions. he said that there is going to be a comet and hiding in the comet was aliens following the tail of the comet. he then told us aliens came to his house opened up the roof of his sons bedroom and a beam of light lifted his son out of his bed floating in the air an alien qw him of turmoil is going to happen. little boys will become murderers.The alien said devastation will happen around the world.At first i thought this guy was out of his mind. what made me believe him was, one of the guards knew him personnaly and he said it was not the chief he new, the guards all new him.The chief was so wound up the guards escorted him out. i just wanted to see the comet that he said was coming.I was released in dec 1996. the irony about this instead of seeing the comet i saw a ufo. to this day his predictions have happened and still happening. school murderers, natural disasters he was right about everything he was saying.Hn
content.summary: Bright light on top of shrub across the street.

content.detailedDescription: I couldn't sleep due to my illness, i heard dogs whine and a weird noise,i got my phone which is my night light. i looked out thru screen window and saw a erratic behavior of this object.Not real bright,lasted 3,4 minutes ..Felt a rush like i was on good drugs.Well,it turned out i lost 20 minlasor like burn on my left wrist.I have a brain tumor and after that, the next 3 days were pain free.Thanks
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Cube in the south west side of mt shasta,multiple ships

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 10:30 am,while working in downtown houston, i looked up at a cable pole that i was to work on, and saw a very bright white light, very high in the sky. it was three times brighter than a star. it was much higher than airplanes fly, since i could see airplanes going by below it.
it just hovered there at about 80 degrees towards the sw sky over the downtown area.
it appeared to be in three pieces, a triangle on the top, and a square in the middle and some other shape, hard to make out. as it spun at a high rate of speed, i saw it throw off sparks twice, once on the left side and once on the right side.
my father is a pilot, so i know how high planes fly, and this was very much higher, i watched it until high clouds covered it. it was not a cloudy day.
i would like to know if anyone else saw this and what it could have been.
this happened the week before christmas, not sure of the exact day.
content.summary: At approximately while working in downtown houston i looked up at a cable pole and saw a very bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was heading north on sconticut neck road with a friend of mine when i observed something fluttering about three feet off the ground and flying right towards us. my first thought was is my friend seeing the same thing i am and my mind immediately returned to the first time i had witnessed a ufo back in the 60's.I continued forward as the orb flew right at us. just as it approached the front of the car it flew right over the hood! it was amazing however it scared the crap out of my friend. he told me he couldn't sleep at all that night and was scared to death. the orb was 2 to three feet in length  and was flying two to three feet off the ground. it pulsated or waivered maybe like a cloaking device. it kind of looked like a jack that kids play with without the spike going thru the middle. as it was flying directly at us it moved back and forth like a needle in a compass going from east to west back to east again back to west back to east etc. until it flew over the hood of the car and vanished! unlike my friend i had or experienced no fear.  god bless mufon and all others who have had encounters of any kind!
content.summary: Orb. apx. 3 ft. long. flew right at the windsheild of the car i was driving. when about to hit car flew right over the hood and vanished. like a mirage. paper thin. like a jack that kids play with without the spike going thru the middle

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were sitting on the patio talking and having some drinks.  we are on a flight path so we see planes pretty regularly.  my sister had been making comments about going south when she got up to go inside and make us another drink.  i laid my head back on the chair and spotted a moving object very high up in the sky, looking about the same size as surrounding stars.  it came across the sky headed west,  i said to my sister,  "hey shannon how about that one",  she said "nope, its not going south, that's not my ride" and the door closed, suddenly the object made a 90 degree turn and began heading south, disappearing after a few seconds.  i yelled to my sister, "hey, it's going south now" before i realized what i had just seen.  i was completely stunned and in awe at what i had just witnessed,  i am no expert but i know we cannot make 90 degree turns in our aircraft. my sister came back out and we continued looking but did not see it again.
content.summary: Light in sky does 90 degree turn instantly

content.detailedDescription: My observations of the craft or crafts lasted 40 minutes from 10:50pm when first craft was observed to 11:29pm when the last one was observed. the first craft came out of the east and appeared as a dim light which got brighter at certain times. i observed the first craft for approximately 5 minutes, from 10:50 till 10:55pm watching it go north but then came back around moving in a southerly direction. all of a sudden it made a maneuver of moving westward but climbing at the same time to right under the cloud ceiling hovering a bit before disappearing into the clouds. there was intense lightning happening where i observed this craft at the same time, with huge bolts coming down from the clouds . . . but also the web like lightning that flashes across the clouds too all across the sky since we were having intense thunderstorms, with rain and wind that night. i thought it was over at that time but then another light appeared almost in the same spot and did the same maneuvers as the first craft which i observed at 11:07pm but lasted less time until 11:09pm. it actually went right to the same place as the one before it did and it hovered just slightly before disappearing up into the clouds. right before the second one came into view, i observed a fluttering very bright light down at a building that is on the ground level. i thought to myself what could that be! it appeared to be some kind of flapping bright light, like a fairy type winged creature. it was way too large to be a moth and i have never seen a glowing bright bird or bat before. i have not seen anything like that under that building ever before either. i observed this creature for only 5 or maybe 10 seconds staring at 11:06pm right before my  second sighting of 11:07pm. the third sighting came at 11:15pm to 11:17 pm and the craft made the same moves coming from the same direction as the others. the fourth and last craft i saw appeared at 11:29pm to 11:32 pm came from the east but this time came towards me moving westward and up to the clouds without going north or moving around. it appeared larger than the other ones and either emitted some beam of light or was being pulled up by a beam of light. i believe it was the former of the two and not the latter. i also believe there was a mothership above the clouds because of these maneuvers but just the intensity of the lightning. i had the sensation and feeling that it was right above me. note also that i live in the flight patterns of the d/fw airport. there were airliners taking off but these planes were being directed to bank to the left getting away from the lightning storms or even maybe being directed away from the mothership itself. this is just my feeling but i had not seen airliners bank that much to the left to go north before but this is only a guess as to why. now either i saw 4 different craft or it was the same one going round and round making the same maneuver over and over. i have had so much contact now since 2010... i would say i have had way over 200 sightings many of which i reported here. the activity is ramping up and the messages i have received from them tells me that something huge is about to happen. i was told this back in 2010 but i'm being told now is the time. i need to get this out and i should be on your show or become more than an investigator for i feel they have contacted me for a reason and it is more than just to see them so i can report these things to you. they have burned a symbol in my brain which happened in 2011 and it means something. i need to talk with one of you "experts" and not just a field investigator. i know more than they do and time is running out! take it for what it's worth... it's about to happen and it's now
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Objectflying into mothership?

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from the hospital at 3 am. my wife said what the h--- is that. we had no idea.It crossed over our truck just past the main power lines,going nnw. it looked like a bright floresnt tube, white, with a red  glow at the tail.No sound. it bank3ed to the left  and part of the front took on a slightly different shape. then it just was gone.
content.summary: It pasted over us going nnw. looked like a floesent light bulb, white , red at the end. banked to the left saw a flat nose, and it vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was on a farm in mattapoisett, massachusetts, on a former dairy farm that had no livestock. i was about 7 or 8 years old playing outside with one of the kids who lived on the farm. all of a sudden the mother of the child i was playing with comes pulling in the driveway and her oldest son jumps out of the car shouting look it's a flying saucer! i looked to my left up in the sky and he wasn't kidding. i'd have to say no more than 100 feet in the air and landing in the field right in front of were i was playing descends this glowing saucer shaped light or orb. myself and four or five of the kids just stand there in amazement for a few moments. then i remember us trying to approach it taking no more than 3 or four steps before it began to rise off the ground , silently. we all paused as it lifted off the ground. it then hovered above us, circled around probably only 25 to 30 feet above our heads  then lifted off into the sky. i was excited and very disappointed that it vanished. i thought it was awesome and ever since that day when i have had really trying experiences i always think back on that day to help me through my own personal ordeals. i was never afraid of  what ever it was, the same however couldn't be said for the mother and at least one of her children who tried to call otis air force base. he didn't get the number right or something and then his mother wouldn't let him call.  years later i ran into the mother and she still doesn't want to talk about it. i'm not sure about her children. this isn't my only ufo experience i have had two others which were decades later which i will go on to explain and file a report with mufon right after i finish this one. god bless mufon and everyone else who has had an encounter of some kind!
content.summary: Saucer shapped,glowing no sound ,10 to 20 ft. in diameter, probably5 to 9ft tall, we approached  object rose straight up hovered around us for a few moments then just flew up into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
When i completed my security mobile check of site i parked the vehicle looked across to the sports field and saw a very bright light beam across from grounds dept to the corner of a building. the beam was at chest height. i got back into the vehicle and drove back to the area, nothing, noone around, i used my night scanner and the field is enormous and noone could of hidden from me. i am ex police and am trained to observe. i reported a ufo yesterday, expecting to see it again following x 2 sightings on x 2 different nights i was ready for the sighting but nothing last night.
what was also strange re my x 2 sightings was i tried to photograph the object but couldnt pick up on my mobile or camera. what is happening is very strange as i have worked security on this site for almost x 9 years and these events are the first time i have seen on this site which is very large. i am going to join mufon in the future as there is something out there i cannot explain.  regards, brian.
content.summary: Bright white light beam from across sports field to corner of building at least 500 yards at chest height.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a park not far from my house trying to see a meteor shower. i noticed alot of stars out and saw what i thought was 3 stars in a triangle pattern in the sky. after a while the lights began to move. they were going straight for a bit and then began slowly going side to side. they moved left and right and up and down. then after a bit they light got dimmer and smaller then were gone. i tried to use my camera to get a video but i guess it was too far away because it didn't catch it. i have also have 3 other instances in my life where i saw ufos also. once when i was about 6 or 7 and both my parents witnessed it at a drive in movie theatre. once when i was 13 while looking through a telescope. and once last year at my mother's house in sharon pa. these three instances were all different though.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 lights in a triangle pattern

content.detailedDescription: At about 9:15pm, i was watching tv and saw a flash at window which prompted me to look outside and observe a distant storm which was lighting up a large anvil cloud. i then noticed a green orb hovering about 50 feet above a tree along the louden ditch and assumed it was the light of a distant airplane (although i had never seen an airplane at night that uses green lights.) it was only when i observed several airplanes with the typical flashing red lights and continuous movement through the sky that i realized that what i was seeing was an anomaly. i continued to observe the green orb which momentarily faded to red and then returned to green and it wobbled and hovered at about the same distance above the tree top along the louden ditch. i was rather shaken by this observation and, because i wanted a second party's opinion, i woke up my spouse. we then observed the green orb lower in to the tree canopy where it remained for about 2 minutes, lit the entire time. my spouse left for a moment to get his phone and, while he was gone, i witnessed the orb rise in to the sky above the tree at about the same height of 50 feet, and then observed two very bright white orbs moving rapidly along the horizon, approaching from the northeast. one of the orbs began to ascend towards the green orb and the green orb began to descend slightly towards the white orb - the other white orb ascended momentarily and then rapidly moved towards the southwest away from my field of vision. after the green and white orb appeared to touch, the white orb descended to the horizon and moved rapidly away towards the southwest away from my field of vision. my spouse returned (he missed this entire meeting of orbs.) the green orb hovered in place for a moment and then my spouse and i observed it ascend at a constant speed straight up to a height of about 200 feet before it descended again in to the tree canopy along the louden ditch and remained there, lit, until i decided that i had seen enough. i didn't really sleep well because of this incident and woke up at 1am and observed two rapid flashes from outside but didn't want to see or know what it was. i really don't like that i saw this and i hope that i don't see it again because it was disturbing and too near to my home. i have attached a google map with marker showing tree along ditch where orb was observed.
content.summary: Green orb hovering above horizon; changed to red briefly; met two other white orbs.

content.detailedDescription: I live in west bengal, india. in nadia district. on my way to my working place krishnagar i saw a wheatish, sphre shaped object hovering in the air over high voltage power line. it was reflecting and glowing like like a pearl.I was in a public bus and saw it while passing by. i was just casually staring outside when i saw it. i could not understand what it was when i first found it. saw three of them at different places but all of them were over power lines. they seemed stationary. i was quite astonished. i lost sight of them as the bus moved.
content.summary: Saw a spherical ufo.

content.detailedDescription: The sightings are nightly @ 12:15am, they come from the nw heading se. there are 4 @ a time, about the time one flies out of sight, another comes into sight & fly nearly directly overhead at my work. i thought they were planes at 1st but as they got closer you could tell they were triangular & huge! outsized a couple planes in the area on a massive scale. there's a blinding bright light in the center & smaller blue-green lights at the corners. they make absolutely no sound, yet i hear the smaller planes in the area at further distances. i was in awe when i seen them. amazed at their size shape & lack of sound. i watched as they crept bye one at a time til out of range. it's scary to know something like this exists & i have no clue what it is!
content.summary: Sighted several nights in a row, same flight pattern huge triangular silent objects in fours.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the lightning during a storm with my cell phone. after viewing the pictures that i had saved i came across this picture that clearly has an object in it. i did not see anything with my eyes nor did i hear anything outside other than the thunder and light rain. i was sitting in the open doorway with no obstructions in front of me.
content.summary: Was taking lightning photos and one picture had object in it

content.detailedDescription:
I was 7 years old... just got back to town from a family trip.
it was around 5 am when we got home. we all entered our house... but i forgot a brand new toy in our truck my parents had just bought me. i went outside to get the toy and as i was returning to the house door... my older brother locked ghe house door , he didnt know i was outside. i went to the door and knocked a couple of times.... and out of nowhere i turned to my right...... and in between two pillars i saw a being just 5-6 feet away from me! i was so frightened i started to scream and cry banging on my door so hard! i still remember what the being looks like..... it was shorter than me... almost transparent glowing hair...Clear kind of hair. no nose small mouth...Bigger eyes than human eyes.... blue eyes..
i banged on the door and yelled and cried almost fainting from the fear i felt! each time i would look over to it... it was always closer.... it was almost 3-4 feet away when my brother opened the door and i stumbled in and ran into my room crying. i was traumatized for awhile still to this day i am 25 years old and i am not able to sleep alone sometimes. i dont think it was trying to harm me..... it almost looked like it wanted to communicate in a way .. i dont know... but i did see this being and when i was 15 years old i started to research what it could have been. multiple possibilities.... but maybe il never know. 
i know they exist..... i am not a scientist but i have a certain knowledge of these things now. 
i even feel god ( i am of christian faith) can be connected .... angels, gods, jesus christ, i feel people many many years ago could not understand what they saw.... so they used the vocabulary they had to explain. ( my opinion only of course) 
maybe mufon can help me find more information on these beings... maybe i might be of some help! if anything please contact me! thank you.
content.summary: I saw a human like being, clear hair, no nose, almost white or transparent. 5 feet away.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog outside to go to the bathroom, when i noticed a thunderstorm forming over a town about 30 miles away. i decided to film the storm for a bit, and as i was standing there i saw the green orb appear and go across the screen on my phone and then take off across the sky. i felt breathless and it took me a few seconds to comprehend what i had just seen, in the video i actually pause for 3 seconds before i am even able to say anything it was absolutly shocking. i looked around the sky and there was nothing there. when i went back and looked at the recording, i noticed that it did not appear to be any natural phenomenon that i am aware ofand it seems to come out of nowhere and was heading upwards.
content.summary: I was recording a thunderstorm many miles away, and a green orb appeared out of nowhere

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
i was going out to our shop building because i saw the lights in the back of the building had been left on. as i was walking to the shop i heard a low rumble and expected to see an aircraft approaching. instead i saw a large black triangle object i could not identify directly over head. i am a commercial pilot so i think i could identify most aircraft. this was large triangle shape object and had bright white lights at each of the 3 corners. in the center was a pulsing red/white light. no red/green indicator lights as on normal aircraft. the craft was extreme black against a star lit night. at first i thought it was about 2000 ft agl, but i can't be sure because the sound trailed the object by a short distance. as i watched the object head due north from my position i saw what looked like something descend from the vehicle at a fixed distance. i thought at that time maybe it was a military fueling aircraft and a drogue line was deployed. it had the pulsing red/white light on it. however, as it continued north from my location, that object rotated around and above the main object as it pasted over the horizon from my view.
content.summary: Large triangle white lights at each corner center pulsing red/white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the porch behind my apartment having a cigarette.  i looked back to the apartment and glanced up at the second story window.  what i could only describe as an orb of light drifted out of the window.  it wasn't necessarily bright; it didn't illuminate anything nor was it blinding by any means.  it was as though the light existed within the orb.  at first, i dismissed it as a reflection in my glasses, but i turned my head, and the orb did not move.

it hovered roughly 15ft or so above the ground and a foot or two outside of the window for 20-30 seconds, i would guess, and then it moved off to my left.  it wasn't a brisk movement, just an even movement to my left. it stayed at the same height and roughly the same distance from the back of the apartments as it moved before reaching the end of the row of apartments and turning to the right around the corner.  i went through the apartment to the front door but could not locate it again.

it moved independently from how i turned my head, so i know it wasn't a reflection or refraction from my glasses.  it was definitely a separate entity and was not a light shining on the glass or brick, as after it began moving, i stepped forward and could see a clear space between the orb and the back wall of the row of apartments.  

its appearance wasn't a bulb of light, such as a light bulb.  it was more of a diffuse glow.  i could see the window frame behind the orb and the bricks after it moved.  as for its "personality", when i think back on it, i would describe it like: it was in my bedroom upstairs then came outside, not expecting to see anything.  it "saw" me standing there and paused for a moment to see if i was anything interesting to investigate.  having concluded that i wasn't anything interesting, it moved on to do whatever it was going to do in the first place.  it was sort of like how you would see a wild animal in the forest.  when you discover it and it discovers you, you stare at each other for a moment while it gauges whether or not you are interesting in some way or a threat.  when it concludes you are neither, it moves on to whatever it was doing.

i am not saying this is what it "thought".  i had no communication with it, nor did i feel any kind of psychic/psychological effects from it other than the general intrigue and curiosity it inspired.  i only describe it's "personality" as a reflection of what it seems like it was doing.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light orb witnessed

content.detailedDescription:
Standing outside having a smoke, i was looking up at the stars as i usually do.  as i glanced to the northeast, little over halfway up into the sky, i saw a flash of light in the sky, just out of my direct line of sight.  it was very concentrated in one location and did not illuminate the surroundings.  it also did not stay on for any length of time; it was as short as a camera flash.  

i was able to note the shape of the flash.  it wasn't circular, nor was it strictly rectangular.  if you take a thin board of wood and roughly snap off pieces at both ends, you'll end up with a jagged edge on both top and bottom.  that is the closest i can think of to describing the shape.

the other way i would describe it is if you took a length of cellophane wadded it up, there would be one side of the ball that is relatively smooth.  if you turn it so that the side catches the light, it will flash momentarily right when it catches the light right.  that is what it looked like. 

i have never seen a known iridium flare, so i cannot say it wasn't that, but i could find no evidence of an expected flare in my area at that time.  it also definitely wasn't heat lightning. the light was too concentrated in one location.

i did not witness any movement of any object in that area prior to or following the event.  however, i have seen such flashes multiple times in the recent weeks, but this was the first one i was looking at semi-directly and couldn't dismiss as being a reflection in my glasses.
content.summary: Flash in the sky
